T02D3628:246a-1: krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D3628:246a-3: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3628:246a-4: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i dgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3628:246b-0: dang por re @246b zhig sgrub pa pas stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3628:246b-1: aam yig dmar po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3628:246b-2: de'i steng du h'um yig mthing nag bkod la h'um
T02D3628:246b-3: yig mthing nag gi 'od zer gyis gshin rje mthar
T02D3628:246b-4: byed la sogs pa'i bla ma dang /
T02D3628:246b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs la me tog la
T02D3628:246b-7: sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing phyag
T02D3628:246b-8: 'tshal nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs
T02D3628:246b-9: pa byas te / stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3628:246b-10: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3628:246b-11: de'i rjes la aam yig dmar po las skyes pa'i
T02D3628:246b-12: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um yig de yongs su
T02D3628:246b-13: gyur pa las rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag
T02D3628:246b-14: po h'um yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par
T02D3628:246b-15: bya'o // h'um yig gi 'od zer gyis bskul nas
T02D3628:246b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu gzhug pa
T02D3628:246b-18: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las gshin rje mthar byed bsam par bya'o //
T02D3628:246b-19: zhabs g-yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3628:246b-22: sku mdog mthing nag / phyag g-yas kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa mthing nag bsnams pa /
T02D3628:246b-23: phyag g-yon pa sdigs mdzub mdzad pa /
T02D3628:246b-24: de lta bur gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed spro ba
T02D3628:246b-25: dang bsdu ba'i tshul gyis sna tshogs chu skyes kyi
T02D3628:246b-26: steng du nyi ma la bzhugs pa ma he'i steng
T02D3628:246b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i
T02D3628:246b-29: dkyil 'khor la h'um yig yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3628:246b-30: / h'um yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbyug pa
T02D3628:246b-31: mthing nag las h'um yig gi 'od zer gyis 'gro
T02D3628:246b-32: ba rnams snang bar byas te /
T02D3628:246b-33: slar yang de la de bzhin du rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3628:246b-34: rim pa 'di nyid ji srid 'dod kyi bar du spro ba dang bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D3628:246b-35: dam tshig la sogs pa'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bas so //
T02D3628:246b-36: de bzhin du gnyis gsum bzhi'i thun mtshams su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3628:246b-37: aom hr'i:sht'i:bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3628:246b-38: zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
